name: Telekinetic Beekeeper
description:
You play as a Telekinetic Beekeeper. Whose job is to help contain the zombie bees so they can be administered the cure. Use the arrow keys to move, press the R key to reload the game, and press the Bee key to pickup the Bees.

Thank you for playing my third game, I hope to see you soon.

Sincerely, DarkSerpent
